mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.content, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, a.view_count as viewCount, a.member_no as memberNo, b.name from notice a, member b where a.member_no=b.no

select no, title, content, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, view_count as viewCount, member_no as memberNo, name, rn from (select c.*, rownum as rn from (select a.*, b.name from notice a, member b where a.member_no = b.no order by a.no desc) c) where (#{noticePage} - 1) * 10 + 1 <= rn and rn <= #{noticePage} * 10

select a.no, a.title, a.content, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, a.view_count as viewCount, a.member_no as memberNo, b.name from notice a, member b where a.member_no = b.no and a.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where no = #{no}
update notice set view_count = view_count + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, title from (select * from notice order by REG_DATE desc) where rownum<=5
